channel.title: Sodas on DMN developer documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Sodas on DMN developer documentation

item.title: Soda Partner Widget
item.description: The Soda Widget can be used to list and sell your vouchers from your own website. The widget is fully responsive to the container in which it is placed. This means the widget works great on both desktop and mobile screens. It also means you can either use it cover the full width of your page, or restrict it to a side bar or smaller column. Setting up the widget The widget is included using javascript.
